amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to retire conventionally armed air launched cruise missiles (AGM-86 C/D).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to retire conventionally armed air launched cruise missiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Nugent.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
